results.title: Sriracha You're Hot Print, Foodie Art Print
results.description:
Sriracha Christmas Card, Hot Sauce Holiday Card

A vibrant print for that special someone who LOVES Sriracha and spicy food.

This makes a perfect addition to the dining room, kitchen, living room or office!

- 8" x 10" unframed print, vertical orientation
- Smooth matte white acid-free archival paper, 88 lb cover weight. 
- Printed with bright fade-resistant ink.
- Fits perfectly into a standard 8"x10" frame (not included)
- Each print is signed on the back. Unframed prints will ship in a protective sleeve in a rigid cardboard mailer.

Shop.title: Plate & Pencil
Shop.announcement:
***USPS is experiencing an unprecedented volume of mail this December that is delaying a small percentage of standard and Priority shipments. All online merchants are affected, not just Etsy sellers. We at Plate & Pencil apologize if you are experiencing delays.*** 

Proudly made in Brooklyn, NY. Plate & Pencil features screen printed tote bags, tees, and housewares with food-inspired designs. This new design shop was founded by Diana Kuan, a Brooklyn-based illustrator, designer, and writer.

We draw influences from our food, travel, and the great outdoors, and create quality products with sustainable materials..
Shop.policy_welcome:
Welcome to Plate & Pencil! 

After years of looking for gift products for her family and friends who are obsessed with food around the world, food writer and cooking teacher Diana Kuan launched a shop that specializes in food-inspired designs for home decor and apparel. 

Our eco-friendly products are all designed in Brooklyn, NY. We strive to created a sustainable business using materials made in the U.S. or abroad with companies that follow Fair Labor/Fair Wage practices. 

Thanks for stopping by!
Shop.policy_payment:
We accept payment through Paypal, either via credit card or with an existing account and credit cards directly through Etsy

Please ensure your shipping address listed on Etsy matches your Paypal shipping address, otherwise the order may be delayed while we confirm the correct address before shipping.
Shop.policy_shipping:
We ship 1 to 3 business days from day of purchase. Custom orders may take longer (please send an email to inquire about a specific item.)

All shipments include a tracking number for your convenience (US only).

We love shipping internationally, though please be aware that depending on your country goods may be subject to import VAT & customs duty on the customer end.
Shop.policy_refunds:
Returns or exchanges accepted within 7 days from receiving your purchase (the "delivered" date according to USPS tracking) minus cost of shipping. Items must be returned in the same condition (new, unworn, unwashed) that it arrived to you in. We just ask that you cover your cost of shipping the item back to us. Please contact us right away if you are unsatisfied with your purchase in any way.  

Exchanges: 

*U.S. Orders- We will cover the shipping of the new item cost back to you. 

*International Orders- We offer a discounted return shipping cost of 1/2 the original shipping. Please be sure to include a check or money order with your return. Refer to your Etsy invoice to find the original shipping cost.
Shop.policy_additional: Tote bag care: Spot clean or machine wash cold, hang dry. Washing tote bags in warm or hot water and drying in a commercial dryer may lead to shrinkage.
